long_description: Lightweight, cushioned and designed to follow the flex of your feet, the Merrell Mimosa Glee shoes deliver a fun and comfy ride. Shoes feature nubuck and pig suede leather uppers with breathable mesh linings to keep your feet cool. Construction provides a good combination of natural flex, contoured support and performance cushioning for all-day comfort. Q-Form(TM) alignment system provides women with a precise anatomic fit for superb, tailored comfort. Merrell air cushions in the heels absorb shock and add stability. M-Select FRESH natural enzymes prevent odors from developing. Merrell Mimosa Glee shoes have grippy soles that grab hard and soft surfaces.
short_description: Lightweight, cushioned and designed to follow the flex of your feet, the Merrell Mimosa Glee shoes deliver a fun and comfy ride.
